title: Cream Cheese Penguins
description: Just imagine a cute display of penguins, made with black olives, carrots and cream cheese! You can add scarves and hats by using fresh red pepper strips, or canned pimentos cut into different shapes. Use frilly toothpicks if you can.

title: Spicy Sweet Potato Hash
description: Spicy and comforting thanks to BBQ sauce, jalapeno, and chicken bacon, this sweet potato hash is a quick and easy side dish that's sure to please.

title: Chicken Quesadillas
description: Zesty chicken and cooked peppers are a tasty delight when mixed with cheese and stuffed in a tortilla to create chicken quesadillas.
